title: What would happen if everyone stopped eating meat tomorrow? - Carolyn Beans

multiple-choice.question: What happens to greenhouse gas emissions if all meat were suddenly removed from the shelves?

options.label: C
options.text: It has no effect on biodiversity.

options.label: C
options.text: It would reduce greenhouse gas emissions.

options.label: D

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: The Earth's mantle is too hot.

options.label: C

options.text: The Earth's crust is too thick.

options.label: B
options.text: The tectonic plates are moving too slowly.

options.label: C
options.text: The intensifying pressure in unstable zones may ultimately trigger an earthquake.
